Contact Us

Your Gateway to Tanzania’s Majestic Wildlife

Why Choose Us?

We are based in Tanzania

Camel Leon Safaris Ltd. was born out of a love for the idea of adapting to various environments, mirroring the chameleon's ability. Our founders wanted to share this experience with people in the wilds of Africa, highlighting the beauty of nature when one immerses and adapts to it.

United Republic of Tanzania, Kilimanjaro Region Nshara,Aishi Road, Plot 173A | P.O Box 938

Privacy Policy

Tipping Guide

At Camel Leon Safaris Ltd., we specialize in creating personalized safari experiences that immerse you in the heart of Tanzania's stunning landscapes and vibrant cultures. Nestled in the wild beauty of Tanzania, our expert team is dedicated to providing unforgettable adventures.

Expert Guides: Our guides are the finest in the region, offering deep insights into local wildlife and culture.
Transparent Pricing: No hidden fees, ensuring you get the best value for your adventure.
Personalised Service: Tailored itineraries and exceptional customer service, backed by numerous 5-star reviews.
Sustainable Tourism:We prioritise eco-friendly practices to preserve Tanzania’s natural beauty.

Our only office is in Tanzania, but for your convenience we are accessible through international phone numbers, which you can use to contact our Sales Department. In addition, we are happy to talk via our online chat
